name: ezbookkeeping
description: ezBookkeeping is a self-hosted bookkeeping and finance management app. It tracks income, expenses, categories, accounts, and budgets, with charts and reports to help individuals or small businesses manage money.
features: Income & Expense Tracking: Monitor all financial transactions. Complete money management.
Budget Management: Set and track spending limits. Stay within budget.
Account Organization: Manage multiple accounts and categories. Structured finances.
Financial Reports: Charts and summaries of your money. Clear financial insights.
Small Business Ready: Perfect for individuals and small businesses. Scalable solution.
Self-Hosted: Keep your financial data private. Your books, your control.
